{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AMIT |model=CTG111 |revision=(MTC) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=mobile hotspot |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052;RT3052F; |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN29LV320BT-70TIP |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3V28S40ETP |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pad header |serial=yes,, 4-pad header |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052;RT3052F; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Longcheer U6300V |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_802dot11_protocols=3G (HSUPA) |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=ProSLIC VoIP Chip;Silicon Labs;Si3210;Si3210-FT;1; |flags=SIM card slots |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|3G Modem Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.shop.mts.ru/modemy-i-routery/ustroystva-dostupa-v-internet/router-ctg-111.html}}
